website_summaries.verdict: Comes with a wide range of software to get you up and running quickly on both Mac and PC, but it really shines as an iPad audio interface.
pros: Has 2 combo inputs with low-noise and high headroom
Works with a wide range of Mac and PC software
Software includes Capture Duo for iPad and Studio One 3 Artist DAW
cons: Does not charge your iPad when you're using it
Some found there is a fair amount of latency when using MIDI

customer_reviews.title: Interface has internal headphone sound problem
customer_reviews.text: Interface has headphone sound problem. Sound cannot be heard until suddenly on at 95% gain, suddenly off at 94% or so. I contacted tech support and they asserted system must be bad but second unit did same and I saw other reviews saying unit had this problem. System is not very useable if the gain has to be set too high too hear and gives not flexibility in setting the headphone sound to desired level. I tried on iPad and multiple computers with same problem resulting. I really wanted this system to work as I researched many units before buying. I will have to send units back.
customer_reviews.author: mpv

customer_reviews.title: Best portable solution
customer_reviews.text: Need a way to record at home or on the go. PRESONUS is that company. Presonus hit the mark with this product. You can record on a computer or even on your IPAD. It comes with studio one artist and everything you need to start making quality recordings. I currently have it setup at home with my mac mini and studio one professional. If you have any questions, the forums are the way to go. Everyone there is super helpful and willing to help you out. If you still cant resolve your problems, Presonus technical support is there and they are amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Castillo

customer_reviews.title: This works.
customer_reviews.text: I use this with the Multitrack DAW app on an iPad. The app recognizes it with no problem, plug-and-play. A huge improvement over the previous hit-and-miss pipeline. I do not need to use a preamp with my LR Baggs LB6 pickup, my Shure SM57 also works perfectly. The provided software, which I don't use, is not included in ths rating!
customer_reviews.author: B. Pedit

customer_reviews.title: Great starter-bundle
customer_reviews.text: I'm very new to PC-based home studio stuff & this is good gear for a good price. The software suite (and its various plug-ins) is a lot to digest & can be easy to get overwhelmed...but the documentation is good. I highly recommend going through the tutorial. You'll be well on your way to having a successful home-studio experience.
customer_reviews.author: Loki222

customer_reviews.title: Great digital audio interface at good price
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, small and compact, well made. Mostly--Great sound! Easy to use, even if you are not using their digital audio workstation software. I use garageband on my ipad, don't fuss with it much there, and then airdrop it to my iMac. Or you can just use a laptop. Does not have to be Mac either, I don't believe. I started with iOne and quickly knew I would would stereo capability and shipped that back and got the iTwo. Worth the extra 40$. enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Espressivo

customer_reviews.title: The quality is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I use it live and it works perfectly. The quality is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: When it works it works!
customer_reviews.text: When it works it sounds great! There are software issues from time to time. I think it has to do with Apple updates.
customer_reviews.author: chris thompson

customer_reviews.title: Echo...echo....echo
customer_reviews.text: Latency (echo) issues with Presonus. Impossible to do multitrack recording because what you hear in headphones is out of sync with playback. If so, go to the studio one tab at top of screen, go to preferences (or options, depending on model),... you know what? You want to reduce sample rate, so just go to you tube and pull up “Presonus Latency Issues”.
customer_reviews.author: Tobin Hampton

customer_reviews.title: I cannot say anymore than the seller and team are ...
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say anything more than the seller and team are top notch people. The interface does more than I expected and the software is more than I will ever need. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: drpopp64

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The app is somewhat limited in effect but includes the full desktop version as a download (when I bought it at least) where you can transfer your recording. It also reads with GarageBand on iOS devices (iOS 11)
customer_reviews.author: MacCrea Bisel

customer_reviews.title: Does a basic job as an interface
customer_reviews.text: Satisfied with the product. As advertised. Had a few issues but found out it was my acoustic guitar preamp not the presonus that was the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: It works great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought for my wife to use with digital piano. She is just learning the software. So, I can't say much more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Output volume too low
customer_reviews.text: Volume output was way too low for iPhone. Contacted support and they said that it wasn’t compatible with the iPhone. Only the iPad. I got a Yamaha audio interface for the same price and it worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: T Ito

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and a solid product.
customer_reviews.text: It is a very easy to use system. I tried it connected to a PC and also to an iPad.
customer_reviews.author: Robert S Simpson

customer_reviews.title: best device
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the best device I own! It sounds so good as a way to play music from my iphone.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Wolf

customer_reviews.title: I really like this kit
customer_reviews.text: I really like this kit. I record song demos that include two guitars, bass and vocals and I have had cero issues so far. The included software is easy enough for me that had very little previous experience.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: PreSonus AudioBox iTwo Studio
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a good value for everything included. I've seen some with the PreSonus speakers that's maybe a better value.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Sounds Amazing and was packaged well. Everything works so far, no problems. Plus it came with a sweet Sticker
customer_reviews.author: Brandie Nixon

customer_reviews.title: Simply excellent
customer_reviews.text: If you wish to record on your iPhone or iPad, I do not believe there is a better unit out there for the job. From the feature set to the execution, it's clear that whoever designed this thing spent some time thinking it through. You can control the mix between the sound coming in, and your own instrument/mic, you can *separately* control the headphone output and master out, switch inputs between High-Z and Low-Z, provide phantom power... Outstanding. There may be better units out there for recording on a computer. But for iPhone/iPad application, I cannot think of a better unit than this.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Depends on system you got
customer_reviews.text: Cannot use this if you have a Chromebook. Now I gotta invest on getting a windows computer for studio one software.
customer_reviews.author: Shann86

customer_reviews.title: I had sent the item back since I could not use it.
customer_reviews.text: I had sent the item back since I could not use it and so I went to Apple in Southdale and purchased an Apogee One which is exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Larry B.

customer_reviews.title: Love this device
customer_reviews.text: Love this device... especially for the money. The Presonus recording software is awesome and the bonus plugins are professional grade.
customer_reviews.author: Brian M

customer_reviews.title: For Professionals & Amateurs Alike
customer_reviews.text: I didn't care too much for the DAW software included with the bundle, but overall this is something I would recommend to anybody trying to find a budget effective recording set up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Authentic Seller!
customer_reviews.text: This product goes above and beyond what any beginner would need and I recommend looking at this for anyone getting into buying a interface
customer_reviews.author: Mason Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for buck, period!
customer_reviews.text: I brought this as a upgrade from my iRig which I still use one the go. What a excellent product, easy to use, and awesome sound quality! I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ami

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I had a a lot of presonus audio boxes in my music career I recently bought this one and I’m amazed It’s very easy to use and portable
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Makes life a lot simpler for my home recording with my Studio One 4 Professional. Nothing left to do but rock and record!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Knight

customer_reviews.title: Great match with iPhone.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t have ability to connect to computer and iPhone at same time. But it has the connections to do this.
customer_reviews.author: Bill B.

customer_reviews.title: Produces nice sound for recording!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed for my music studio. Software included!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L. Jones

customer_reviews.title: No complaints; works for me!!!
customer_reviews.text: The presonus works for me. Not one complaint. I don't use the software cause I have logic pro x and live ableton.
customer_reviews.author: J. bell

customer_reviews.title: Not connecting to computer
customer_reviews.text: Will not connect to apple laptop.. the gain lights turn red and then randomly flash green and then turn off
customer_reviews.author: periohi

customer_reviews.title: I will recommend it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Good product good sounds. Received as described
customer_reviews.author: Waliu Adekanmbi

customer_reviews.title: Everything is as good as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Unit arrived on time; functions as described. Everything is as good as advertised. I only wish that it can supply charge for the iPad. How difficult is that? Theoretically all it has to do is use the power pin. Then I don't have to worry about running low on battery.
customer_reviews.author: Musing

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for guitar modeling software
customer_reviews.text: Am using the Audiobox iOne for two purposes. First to act as an interface for playing electric guitar into modeling software (Amplitube, Guitar Rig & Revalver.) My second use is to provide connectivity from both Win 7 and a Win 8.1 computer to a set of JBL LSR 305 monitors. The interface excels at both tasks. Set up was exceptionally simple on both computers. Get drivers from the Presonus site. Have not used the DAW software or Mic input.
customer_reviews.author: R. H.

customer_reviews.title: recommended for you
customer_reviews.text: Studio recording quality. there is no CD, but you can download everything for free as promised by presonus. Totally recommend it. The only issue is you have to learn to work on studio one. I have worked on easier recording softwares like cool edit and adobe audition. however studio one is pretty amazing when you learn everything
customer_reviews.author: mohammed

customer_reviews.title: Top notch!
customer_reviews.text: The bees knees. Pipe your axe into your computer, do whatever audio processing magic you like, then pipe it back out to your sound system. USB connection. This little box, plus a laptop, replaces stacks of kick-pedal boards.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Good sound for recording and playback
customer_reviews.text: Good sound for recording and playback, perfect with iPad and MacBook, my only concern is regarding Midi, I have a very big latency problem, I was unable to use it as a midi interface.
customer_reviews.author: Bernie

customer_reviews.title: Limited recoding software, but it works
customer_reviews.text: Recording software that came with this is limited, but this AudioBox works just fine. Couldn't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Hendricks

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this one because you can use it connects your ipad or iphone.
customer_reviews.author: JieWen

customer_reviews.title: I like it very much
customer_reviews.text: I like it very much. I've tried it with my IPad and have opened the software for the Mac and the PC. great!
customer_reviews.author: Bruce A-MT worker

customer_reviews.title: It's a good deal I like everything in this package in just ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a good deal I like everything in this package in just having a lot of trouble using it with other software. Audacity works ok, screen recorders don't pick it up at all, and discord sees it but won't use it
customer_reviews.author: deadpool

customer_reviews.title: this is a great unit to do this with
customer_reviews.text: If you want to do podcasting, this is a great unit to do this with!
customer_reviews.author: Sparechange

customer_reviews.title: Good for price
customer_reviews.text: Works well, kinda quirky but does what its supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great deal for the price. Came with everything it said it would. Everything works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Untwinxer

customer_reviews.title: Useless for iOS capture
customer_reviews.text: This device is billed as a 2-channel capture device for iOS. It does not work in this capacity. Both input channels are summed and delivered to the iOS device as dual mono channels.
customer_reviews.author: Free Ranger

customer_reviews.title: It works wonderfully with GarageBand on both platforms
customer_reviews.text: Rugged case and dials with click feel with very simple and flexible inputs. I use this box to interface my guitar to my MacBook and iPad. It works wonderfully with GarageBand on both platforms. Not all comparable products have a USB connector to connect your iOS device, so if your planning to use your iPad or iPhone, AudioBox 2x2 works great.
customer_reviews.author: K. H.

customer_reviews.title: Great startup system!!
customer_reviews.text: Great startup system!! Had some issues with the installation and there is no number for customer service. At the end I figured out what was wrong.
customer_reviews.author: JJA

customer_reviews.title: Great unit however
customer_reviews.text: Great unit however, The sound was very tinnie. And the volume control nob took about two-three chicks to balance the left from the right. Considering the company I was expecting more. I have and, love their Eris E5s as well as the Trimbler-8 sub... They ROCK!
customer_reviews.author: W. Hickman

customer_reviews.title: Everything is good BUT you're pretty much obligated to upgrade the software
customer_reviews.text: Everything is good BUT you're pretty much obligated to upgrade the software, otherwise your music will stay inside your computer
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Clunky but good
customer_reviews.text: This is a great package for the price. It's a little clunky to use but it gets the job done with quality audio output.
customer_reviews.author: C. T.

customer_reviews.title: i set up everything and i went to install the ...
customer_reviews.text: i set up everything and i went to install the drivers and it did not install the presonus driver on both my desktop and my laptop and so my microphone does not work but the software installed studio one
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: if you are computer savy then this may be perfect for you
customer_reviews.text: too hard to set up. if you are computer savy then this may be perfect for you. had to send mine back cause to much work for my 14 yr old to use
customer_reviews.author: momjf

customer_reviews.title: Faulty software
customer_reviews.text: The software doesn't work with my computer. It flagged it as a virus and refused to allow me to download. I can't even use the equipment now.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan Kay Barker

customer_reviews.title: Trash
customer_reviews.text: Trash it is non functional. The PC Mac power cable continuously goes from working to not work. Unsatisfied
customer_reviews.author: Torin

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice!!!
customer_reviews.text: I make my beats in my home studio, i don't have that much things to hook up so i'm pretty good with this joint right here. For that price, anyone should be satisfied, the translation of audio between the box and the software is smooth a hell. If you're on a budget, this is good enough for you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great iOS interface for audio.
customer_reviews.text: A great device although I can't really hear a difference with the phantom power on or off, my Rode NT1 works on both. Software is good too. A very useful device.
customer_reviews.author: William Darlington

customer_reviews.title: Lame
customer_reviews.text: I received a faulty unit...the power light just blinks and it doesn't recognize the microphone attached
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Right now it's just a useless piece of junk taking up space
customer_reviews.text: Can't use the darn thing. There wasn't any instruction book, or anything else with it, so it is just sitting in the box it came in? Could you please send an instruction book on this thing and maybe I can figure it out and use it , and then give a review. Right now it's just a useless piece of junk taking up space. Bobby Wade
customer_reviews.author: Robert L. Wade

product_meta.title: Presonus AudioBox iTwo 2x2 USB 2.0/iOS Interface, PC/Mac 2 Mic Pres
product_meta.description: style:2 Mic PresA great choice for mobile musicians, sound designers, and podcasters, the AudioBox iTwo is USB bus-powered, compatible with Apple iPad, compact, ruggedly built, and works with virtually any Mac, Windows, or iPad recording software. It offers 2 combo mic/line/instrument inputs with high-performance Class A mic preamplifiers, professional-quality, 24-bit/96 kHz converters, and MIDI I/O. It comes with PreSonus Studio One 3 Artist DAW software for Mac and Windows (free download after registration) and Capture Duo for iPad recording software , with direct wireless transfer of your recordings to Studio One.
feature_bullets: Bus-powered USB 2.0/iPad audio and MIDI interface
(2) combo mic/instrument/line inputs with low-noise, high-headroom, Class A mic preamplifiers and +48 V phantom power; (2) 1/4 " TRS Main and (1) 1/4 " Headphone outputs
Start recordings with Capture Duo for iPad one-tap recording application, then finish songs with wireless transfer to included, easy-to-use Studio One music production software for Mac/Windows
Software includes 27 Native Effects, 4 virtual Instruments, and over 6 GB of beats and sample content
Compatible with almost all recording software for Mac, Windows, and iPad
Studio-quality 24-bit resolution; 44.1, 48, 88.2, and 96 kHz sampling rate

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars478 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
